languages.text: "Сии священные машины нуждаются в ритуале обслуживания и могут послужить союзниками в борьбе с предателями".

traits.locale_text: "Сии священные машины нуждаются в ритуале обслуживания и могут послужить союзниками в борьбе с предателями".

languages.text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."
languages.original_text: "Сии священные машины нуждаются в ритуале обслуживания и могут послужить союзниками в борьбе с предателями".

traits.locale_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could become our allies in the fight against the traitors."
"These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could become our allies in the fight against the traitors."
"These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could become our allies in the fight against the traitors."
"These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could become our allies in the fight against the traitors."
"These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."
"These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

languages.text: « Ces machines sacrées ont besoin d'un rituel d'entretien. Elles pourraient devenir nos alliées dans la lutte contre les traîtres. »
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: « Ces machines sacrées ont besoin d'un rituel d'entretien. Elles pourraient devenir nos alliées dans la lutte contre les traîtres. »

languages.text: “这些神圣的机器需要进行维护仪式。只要经过维护，它们就可以协助我们攻击叛军。”
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: “这些神圣的机器需要进行维护仪式。只要经过维护，它们就可以协助我们攻击叛军。”

languages.text: 「神聖な機械たちにはメンテナンスの儀式が必要だ。裏切り者たちとの戦いで我々の味方にできるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖な機械たちにはメンテナンスの儀式が必要だ。裏切り者たちとの戦いで我々の味方にできるかもしれない」

languages.text: "Diese heiligen Maschinen benötigen ein Wartungsritual. Sie könnten uns als Verbündete im Kampf gegen die Verräter dienen."
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Diese heiligen Maschinen benötigen ein Wartungsritual. Wir können sie dann als Verbündete im Kampf gegen die Verräter einsetzen."

languages.text: «Estas máquinas sagradas necesitan un ritual de mantenimiento. Podrían servirnos como aliadas en la lucha contra los traidores».
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: «Estas máquinas sagradas necesitan un ritual de mantenimiento. Podrían ser nuestras aliadas en la lucha contra los traidores».

languages.text: "Bu kutsal makinelere bakım ayini yapılmalı. Hainlerle savaşırken işimize yarayabilirler."
languages.original_text: "These sacred machines are in need of a maintenance ritual. They could serve as our allies in the fight against the traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kutsal makinelerin bakım ayinine ihtiyacı var. Hainlerle savaşırken işimize yarayabilirler."
